{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DSM-G600 vAa.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless G Network Storage Enclosure |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = D-Link_DSM-G600_vA |wikidevi = D-Link_DSM-G600_A1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Donation |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DSM-G600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/15/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/D-Link_DSM-G600_vA |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = O7J-WLMP2454-1A3 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP420BB; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 266 <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F128J3C150; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S561632E-TC75; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = VIA;VT6122; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:17:9A |oui = 00:17:9A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;v1.92;p1; |stockos = Linux;2.4.27;-uc1;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0, IDE UATA133 PATA |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_ide_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC; |addchip = 4-port USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;VIA, VT6212L, 0403CD TAIWAN, 23B6006000;1; ,,, IDE controller;ACARD;ATP865-A;ACARD, ATP865-A, MABD43403-7, (C)ACARD 2004, 0435 TAIWAN;1; ,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Phillips Semiconductor;8563T;8563T 750.1 n4324;1; ,,, RS-232 Level converter;Sipex;SP3243E;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.0.100 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWRT, SlugOS,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/26/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Global Sun WL MP 2454 1A3 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5213A; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR2112A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-TNC |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[http://www.nslu2-linux.org/wiki/DSMG600/HomePage ''SlugOS'' alternate firmware] {{See also|Linksys NSLU2}} Board also contains: * ''VIA'' VT6212L - PCI USB 2.0 Controller providing 2x USB 2.0 ports. * ''VIA'' VT6122 - PCI ''[https://www.viatech.com/en/silicon/legacy/networking/velocity/vt6122/ Velocity SimpliPHY]'' Gigabit Ethernet controller. * ''ACARD'' ATP865-A - PCI Ultra ATA133 IDE Chip providing IDE port. * ''SIPEX'' SP3243E - Intelligent +3.0V to +5.5V RS-232 Transceiver :providing 10 pin serial out.
==Links of Interest== *[http://tsd.dlink.com.tw/ModelDocu.asp?SourceType=download&sno=MNHPIRNO D-Link Manuals and GPL source] *http://download.dsmg600.info/ *[http://www.xbitlabs.com/articles/networking/display/dlink-dsm-g600.html Wireless D-Link DSM-G600 NAS Review]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = v24 RC5 - kernel support |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dsm-g600_a1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ixp4xx |subtarget = generic |arch = armeb_xscale |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
